text: Singa munaaba mwenenyezza mwembiriri (Hafuswa ne Aisha) ewa Katonda (kye kirungi gye muli), anti emitima gya mmwe gyawaganyadde. Naye bwe munamwekalakaasizaako, (mumanye nti) mazima Katonda ali ku luddalwe, ne Jiburilu, n'abakkiriza abalongoofu, ne ba Malayika bonna oluvanyuma lw'ekyo ba kumuyambako
